book.synopsis: Roland, the Last Gunslinger, and his companions--Eddie Dean and Susannah--cross the desert of damnation, drawing ever closer to the Dark Tower, a legion of fiendish foes, and revelations that could alter the world. 30,000 first printing.
book.title_long: The Waste Lands (The Dark Tower, Book 3)
book.dimensions: Height: 9.5 Inches, Length: 6.5 Inches, Weight: 1.85 Pounds, Width: 1.5 Inches
